website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for transporting a lot of groceries without spending a lot of money on pricier insulated bags.
pros: Includes 2 very large (10 x 14.5 x 10 inches) insulated bags that stand on their own
Features a bottom insert you can use for extra stability
and folds completely flat for storage
cons: The zipper can be hard to get around the corners of the lid and the lining can start to rip over time

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: If I had rated these when I first got them, I would have given them more stars. Great to have insulating bags to complement some similar ones I bought that aren’t insulated. However after using one of the bags 4 or 5 tmes, all of a sudden I noticed a piece of cardboard in the bottom of the bag. It was from the lid and the insulating material had completely separated (not ripped, seemed it wasn’t attached properly with how neatly it had come apart). See pictures below. So now that bag is useless. Very disappointing. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and sturdy, and they hold themselves open, which makes Uber Eats deliveries a bit faster and easier because I don't have to struggle with holding the bags open while putting the food inside. Especially when I'm doing double-deliveries. Also, they hold a lot, so I don't have to use multiple bags for large orders as often. Plus, I like that they fold up flat when I need them out of the way. And I really like the colors! Zippers tend to stick a little bit, but hey, they're only $20 for two, so as far as I'm concerned, they're a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far I love them. Used them for shopping today. Super easy to pack and carry. I am keeping 5 of them stores inside a regular reusable bag to carry them in and out the store. People around me were so impressed they were asking were to get them. Nothing moved around in the trunk, they were stackable and items were protected from getting crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Bajanqueen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Useful with One Defect
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great for groceries--very sturdy, with a rigid bottom that can be removed, and they fit a ton of stuff. The polar bears are also the cutest design I've seen on bags like these. Overall, I'm very pleased with them. I'm knocking one star off because the side handles peeled off after a few weeks of use. (Just peeled off like crepe paper. I wasn't even carrying anything heavy). The long straps still work, so I've continued using them for the last eight months, but I'll eventually replace them with bags that have better reinforced side handles, as I found those very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: These are sturdy, fold for easy storage and keep my perishables cold/frozen for the drive back home
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these weekly for 6 months and still love them! I put my frozen groceries in one and my refrigerated perishables in the other as I'm shopping then empty them at the check out to scan and reload. They keep my ice cream frozen and milk cold on my 30 min drive home in the South Texas heat - I could even stop to do another errand on the way home instead of rushing to get my food in the freezer.! Then the bags get folded up in my pantry till the next grocery trip.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsey

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative to typical re-useable grocery bags!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these a couple of times but I've been very happy with them so far. They're easy to assemble and disassemble and the fact they're freestanding makes them so much easier to load than the typical re-usable grocery bags. Both times I've used them the checkout clerks commented on how much they liked them. They're a great size and I like that they have handles on each side as well as over-the-shoulder carry handles. I also like that they're stackable (with zippers closed.) I deducted 1 star because I found the zipper on one to be a little hard to close. Hopefully they'll hold up with regular use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Great design, don't like the cloth material.
customer_reviews.text: I would not order again, as they were a bit pricey. The material is a cloth type material & gets dirty easily. It is not possible to wipe it off. The zipper is finicky and catches in the material. I like the size and the handles are great. I'm just not sure how long it will last. The seller sent an email to ask my opinion of their product. I sent a nice, polite email telling my concerns. They did not respond. Anyway. They stand up nicely when you put groceries in them. I'm afraid the thin material in the bottom will wear out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Merkel

customer_reviews.title: These bags are terrific reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are terrific reusable bags. I have a large family and have tried several different types of bags for grocery store trips: giant blue ikea bags, reused cardboard boxes, garden variety store reusables. These are by far the best. I now have 8 that fold up neatly so that I carry 7 folded bags in one bag. They open and lie flat so that you can easily load and unload. Each holds quite a lot of groceries--several large boxes of cereal in one, a gallon of milk, a melon, several bags of frozen veggies and two boxes of crackers in another, 6-8 gallons of ice-cream in another. They are universally envied--I'm often asked where I found them.
customer_reviews.author: Bobcat

customer_reviews.title: GOODBYE PLASTIC GROCERY BAGS!!
customer_reviews.text: okay what i buy and get put in like 10 plastic bags can go intone of these. Love them well made and LARGE!!! This save me the hassle of storing all those grocery bags and i men like ten per trip ??? Well worth the money and would by again. This version is insulated. The only issue is the bottom holder .. cardboard or what ever it is .. is not attached at the bottom of bag so it can be lost. But other than that.. Great Bag!!
customer_reviews.author: Dj Voodooman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: They don’t fold down perfectly, but they do pretty darn well, and so far, they’re holding up. I use them mostly for a weekly grocery run, so they don’t get super heavy use. I used one to keep my Thanksgiving turkey cold as it thawed in my garage. I left a thermometer probe in so that I could monitor the temperature in the bag. With outside temps in the 40s and low 50s, this kept the turkey between 30 and 40 degrees F as it thawed and freed up my refrigerator space. I did double bag the turkey to prevent leaks and mess. But this sure came in handy in an unexpected way!
customer_reviews.author: MB in AK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Insulated Carriers!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with these insulated bags. Ordered these bags same day delivery for a quick solution to hauling hot food for an out of state occasion. Not only was I able to fit 3 trays of hot food perfectly into the bag, the food stayed hot for many many hours. Completely impressed with the bags, as were others attending the party. These bags are awesome and will come in super handy for the holidays. This is a great buy for the price and size and I highly recommend these Earthwise insulated carriers. Cute designs too.
customer_reviews.author: SWBDBM

customer_reviews.title: the weak point is ZIPPER easy to tear loose-- i love the size just right for large container of greens which i buy often
customer_reviews.text: the weak point is ZIPPER easy to tear loose- they fold nice and flat when not used OR i prefer to keep 1 open with 2nd fold inside ready to go to store- the sides and bottom are very firm and hold shape well- i love the size just right for large container of greens which i buy often- i load 1 w/heavy items to top of bag (for support) and 2nd with lighter then stack/bungee on my cart and they ride perfect looks like these will be the perfect bag for $30 to $50 of groceries
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE D.

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must for groceries!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! If you don't have some you should definitely get at least two. They have great capacity, so they limit the number of bags you have to carry, are well made and make bagging/hauling groceries so much easier. No more wrangling jars and fruit because they rolled out of a plastic bag, plus no more plastic bags!! If you shop with your own bags, these are a must. If you don't yet shop with your own bags, you should start with these.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, high-quality, lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: I keep these bags in my car. Keeps cold stuff cold when I go grocery shopping and have some more running around to do thereafter. I haven't tested them at the beach yet, but they're at least the perfect size and very easy to fold up. Not to mention the really cute colors and design (I got the purple and green ones)! These will be great for tailgating too. So far I'm super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: They work great - they're the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I live about 35 minutes away from a supermarket, so I bought these to put my groceries in on the way home to keep them cold. They work great - they're the perfect size: hold a good amount of groceries without being overly heavy when full. The zipper is a little finicky and it might not hold up to the test of time, but for the price the quality is pretty good. I like how they fold flat. One note is that they are not waterproof, so don't think you can fill it with a bag of ice and beer - it will melt and make a big puddle. I would just use ice packs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin McClaren

customer_reviews.title: These can hold more than I can
customer_reviews.text: We bought these because we live 20 minutes from town and our frozen foods were getting squishy on the way home in the summer. These insulate super well. We can make a couple of stops in town if we need to and not have icecream soup. They also hold a large amount if packed correctly. We can frequently fit all of the shopping for the week for 2 people in these with room to spare (not just the cold items). We've loaded these up plenty heavy with no issues, to the point where I couldn't carry both at once. I plan on ordering a set each for my mother and mother-in-law before next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Hathor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If I can give it zero stars I would . Very disappointing🙄 First one bag the zipper is broken , I'm struggling to zip the bag I take a closer look at the bag to see it's broken!!! Second it does not keep your items cold , I put icee cold bottles of water in the bag, 30 mins later my water is not longer cold. I put my package of grapes in the bag , to keep cool down to open the bag and feel heat . Waste of money . Worst bags I regret buying these. Don't brother these bags not worth $19.99
customer_reviews.author: MySpecialWorld

customer_reviews.title: I seriously am in love with these bags
customer_reviews.text: I seriously am in love with these bags! They are super cute and hold a lot! They are perfect for bringing food to picnics, bbqs, potlucks, etc., along with bringing kids team snacks for sports, scouts, class parties, etc. They are easy to carry, stand up straight so they are easy to load up and I haven't had any issues with them tipping over. The inside cleans out easily. AND they fold down flat so they are very easy to store! Seriously LOVE these bags.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie gandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bags, I used the polar bear one twice. The second time I used it, I started to remove it from the car using the short side handles, and one ripped off!! There wasn't that much in the bag, so disappointed!! They are cute, and seemed like they were really sturdy. Will still use them, but now I know I can't rely on the side handles on the other bag.
customer_reviews.author: It's me

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you want it to do
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I've taken them grocery shopping with me many a time now and they fit quite a bit in them. Side handles make it easy to load them in and our of grocery carts. You may have to play a bit of tetris tfinding the best way to stack, but that's not too bad, to be honest. The only downside, as many have noted, is the dang zipper. Just be aware of it and don't try to yank it closed. Take the extra 5 seconds to zip it carefully and you won't have problems.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags that do the job!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are the bomb! I've had them for quite awhile now, and I have to say they really are amazingly sturdy and do their job. I've packed these things pretty full with refrigerated or frozen items and they're still going strong. I haven't had any issues with the stitching, zippers, or them not keeping the food cold enough. They fold down nicely and I would recommend these and buy from this brand again. Very happy with this purchase and love that they came in a 2 pack.
customer_reviews.author: NiftyNest

customer_reviews.title: These bags are AMAZING! I am trying to go plastic free so ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are AMAZING! I am trying to go plastic free so bought the insulated bags and the regular shopping bag set that matches this set. They hold a LOT of items and the bag zips closed all the way so keeps your groceries cool for a good time period. Love the fact you can fold them back down flat which saves room in the car. Highly recommend them to everyone. Get rid of plastic bags! You don't even need the paper ones now given at health food stores.
customer_reviews.author: vcraig

customer_reviews.title: In love with these
customer_reviews.text: I got these and I just loved them....they are not super huge, but easy to do food shopping. Not sure of the durability, because it is not the same to used them from the shopping cart to the car to the house, than shopping cart, walking with them (putting a lot of pressure) to the house. The straps are long, you fold the bag easy, I like the colors....nice product I like them and I am a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Ja9

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well insulated
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! They are so sturdy! My old insulated bags were falling apart. The lining holding the zipper were separating from the bag and the silver insulated part was tearing inside of the bag. These are bigger than my old ones, can hold more, and have a bottom piece that easily folds down so I can carry heavier items, like milk and other things, with ease. I can't wait to buy more! I also have the brown earthwise groceries bags and love those too! I've dramatically cut down the number of bags I need and trips from the car to the house since I can carry so many heavier things easily. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Watt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I deliver groceries and these bags are super sturdy. Over 1000 deliveries later and they are holding up perfectly. They each fit 2 very full paper grocery bags. I own 4 different patterns of the same bag from this seller. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ebert

customer_reviews.title: ... independent contractor for Instacart and these bags are so perfect for all of the groceries run that I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I work as an independent contractor for Instacart and these bags are so perfect for all of the groceries run that I have to do. Arrived on-time and love these 2 bags! Great for a picnic as well! If you do a lot of grocery shopping and want to opt out from the plastic bags like I do! This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ljane

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW. A couple of weeks ago I received these bags and noticed that one of them came slightly torn near the zipper and the other came with dirt smudges on it. Well, I finally used them and they are not worth the money. Upon placing my contents inside and zipping one of them closed (the one that arrived torn), the zipper broke off completely. I had to tear the bag open to get my items out once I got home. Avoid this product; there are others being sold that are likely much better..
customer_reviews.author: S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love them i need more
customer_reviews.text: Had them for a few months now and I get nothing but compliments and people asking me where I got them I highly recommend he's a great Savor on bags and they're so easy they fold up and sit in my trunk take up very little space and extremely durable I'm surprised how much they can hold
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Love my insulated bags!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use when I shop at Sam's Club. It is so easy to pack the food in these as it rung up by the cashier. Just lift out of the cart, put in the trunk, and go! Each 'box' holds a good amount and keeps the food insulated until we get home. The little handles on the side are so convenient. Easy to fold and store. Great construction.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee888

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart before use
customer_reviews.text: Just got these yesterday and got them out to use today. One had a loose thread hanging out of the handle, straight out of the package! Haven't checked the other yet. They seem sturdy and like they would serve my purpose aside from that. Will likely return. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: StephyH2015

customer_reviews.title: Lots of use and still working!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bags 3 months ago and I use them daily to deliver groceries. These are fantastic. Yes, the cardboard inside the bottom panel is a little warped, but they’re still going strong with a small separation of the zipper on one of the bags in about a 1inch area. No need to replace yet, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AvivaTheDiva

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These bags look great, but they are constructed with a thin layer of the silver insulating material and then very thin cardboard. I don't see how these will hold up, most especially the bottom, if I routinely put even a half gallon of milk in here, or more than 2 or 3 cans. It's just not sturdy. Time will tell, and I'll return to update my review after I've used it more.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Great for Costco Shopping
customer_reviews.text: We get compliments on these all the time. Great for Costco shopping, they will hold a tray of fruit or a flat of sliced meet, handy for packing and carrying -- they hold allot. For a frozen pizza, they angle them in the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Runners

customer_reviews.title: Torn at the seam
customer_reviews.text: I like the bags since they don’t collapse while loading your groceries; however, when we opened our package, the one was torn at the seam.
customer_reviews.author: stocie

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with these products. I get constant positive comments from everyone at the grocery store. And, I love the side handles which let you carry bags that are slightly heavier than normal. However, after a couple months the side straps pull loose and are no longer usable. I suggest the company use a larger grommet head. The straps pulled right through the small grommet. Overall though, this is a great product and I would but again if the grommet issue was fixed.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these! I don't just use them for grocery ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I don't just use them for grocery bags. I take them for potlucks at work, bringing meals to friends, picnics, etc. I get compliments on them all the time, and they are pretty good at keeping foods cool and warm. I was afraid that the bottoms would be flimsy, but in the time I've had them (about 6 months) I haven't had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set of bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I work 24 hour shifts and it works great with room left over. They're the perfect size and not cheaply made. Sturdy handles and seem to be able to hold a good deal of weight. Someone said they believe it could hold 4 gallons of milk. I wouldn't do that. I don't think the bag could handle that much weight. All in all a great set of bags and worth the money. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They stay open when bagging groceries, they zip closed when full and although they aren’t going to keep things frozen all day, they do the trick when you are transporting home. All the baggers at the store love them too!
customer_reviews.author: The Fam Five

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. They store away easily and keep items cold (we added an ice pack). They carry quite a bit. I like the ability to stack one on top of the other in the car. The carrying straps makes it easy to carry your things from the car to inside (and vice versa).
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: So handy and sturdy....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect time of year to use and review these bags. It is reassuring that my perishables are protected in these well-constructed bags. I expect I will see the same sturdiness and versatility as I do in this company’s shopping crates. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Easy and lovely
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my favorite grocery store is 30 miles round trip and it is summer. I have a styrofoam icechest, but it doesn't have handles which makes getting it upstairs awkward. This worked great, the ice wasn't melted (and by 10a it was 90) and with the handles I could carry everything upstairs in one trip.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... a delivery service--often food - and the bags are great for keeping food hot
customer_reviews.text: I am working for a delivery service--often food - and the bags are great for keeping food hot. Probably cold, too, but I haven't used it for that. I also like that they are sturdy enough to stand up and they easily collapse when ready to put away.
customer_reviews.author: psw

customer_reviews.title: Each bag easily held 1 full chicken
customer_reviews.text: These bags worked perfectly for giving the gift of home grown meat to our family. Each bag easily held 1 full chicken, 4 lbs of hamburger, 2 lbs of bacon, package of pork chops, and a beef roast.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Daisies

customer_reviews.title: Nice insulated reusable grocery bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this bag, it kept the food I traveled with warm, which is it's intended purpose, however the material is like that of a reusable grocery bag, (but with reinforced sides and bottom), and the zipper is a little difficult to work. With a little revamping, it could be great! But overall, it's not a bad bag :)
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Just love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic and so nice looking. Very sturdy. I use these all of the time during our warmer weather, when shopping, to toss my cold things in to keep them as cold as possible to the checkout line, then on the trip home.
customer_reviews.author: ReeseR

customer_reviews.title: ... store to pack my cold items and the baggers love them. Multi purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bring these with me to the grocery store to pack my cold items and the baggers love them. Multi purpose!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gendreau

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, good insulation from grocery store to home, and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these weekly for several months. They are sturdy, good insulation from grocery store to home, and lightweight. I store my other reusable bags inside so it's a quick grab-n-go on grocery day. One thing I would have liked to see is a way to carry them by the handles when they are folded/collapsed. Because of the design, only one handle is accessible when folded and it doesn't stay folded on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Dragging around various bags in my car was a hassle. These collapse and take up almost no room. While shopping, I put the Earthwise container right inside my cart and fill it with foods I need to keep cold. At checkout, I just fill it back up and it's ready to go home. Since I live in a hot climate and am 35 miles from the store, I add a freezer pack for extra cool. It makes shopping so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I'll buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags and makes it a lot easier to bring all my groceries into the house not to mention the cashier's love it, that it has a sturdy bottom and makes it easier for them to load my items
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for shopping.
customer_reviews.text: Great for shopping and sorting items. Folding up the Box and putting it away for storage until its next use can be a bit tricky. Maybe a Velcro strap to strap them closed for storage on each side may help? Love the colors and zippered top.
customer_reviews.author: Frabjous Travels

customer_reviews.title: Great shopping totes
customer_reviews.text: Received today and went shopping already. Love the rectangle shape, stood up and stayed open nicely while I loaded my groceries. Had about an hour drive home and frozen foods and dairy items still ice cold. Long handles nice for throwing over the shoulder to bring both bags in (fully loaded) in one trip. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice insulated folding bag for multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and they seem to be of good quality. Sides and bottom are sturdy and the insulation is a nice feature. These bags fold flat and I keep them under the seat of my car for grocery shopping. Frozen food stays cold for hours in these bags. They'd also be nice to use for picnics or to bring drinks and snacks to amusement parks or the beach.
customer_reviews.author: J. Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye disposable bags; hello reusable food box!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these boxes. Pros: -Keep food cold -Holds a good amount of food without overloading and being too heavy to transport -Lays flat for storage -Very durable and very easy to use -Reusable so I don't have to use plastic or paper bags! -Fun colors Cons: -None
customer_reviews.author: school teacher

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these "bags" and they are just what I was looking for. They are extraordinarily sturdy, I've had cheap reusable bags - still do - but wanted something that would last longer with better insulation for our Costco and grocery store trips. These will work well for both. We also purchased the set of three "big box" reusable bags.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: We use these every week and even our cashiers and baggers comment on how nice they are. They fit in our trunk nicely and make bringing in groceries super easy. You can fit a lot in here. It makes it nice to have all your cold/frozen items in one bag so you can get those put away first when you get home.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Staller

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: When I'm at the grocery store, the checkers and packers loading the groceries into my containers tell me they're they easiest to use of any they've worked with. And since these are insulated, the food stays hot or cold until I get them home.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki O.

customer_reviews.title: I love these bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! Even when empty, they stand up nicely in a grocery cart. They also stand up well in the back of my car. A grocery cart can hold two opened up and they fold for storing. They keep things cold even without an ice pack. I bought the non-insulated set as well. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Meow Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: Great bags!! I bought these for carrying hot casseroles to potlucks. I love the long handles and the zipper top. I was able to stack two pans of food in one. I covered a piece of cardboard with foil to place between them for stability. The totes also have handholds on the sides if you don’t want to carry them by the straps. I was very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. I had a previous brand for the past year, it starting wear so I ordered these additonal bags. Turns out they are just as good as the ones I have before. And it really does keep hot food hot and cold items cold. I use them frequently when grocery shopping and need to make other stops before heading back home.
customer_reviews.author: Irehs Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Theae have held up well and they do help keep cold foods cold (and ice cream frozen) on the drive home
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short shoulder straps
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags except that the shoulder straps are not long enough. If you do not have to walk far when carrying the bags they’d be great. They fold very easily and are very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Grace C

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags so much.
customer_reviews.text: These bags fold up neatly and fit prefect under a shopping cart. I can load many frozen boxed goods inside with ease. My items stay cold while being transported home. I love them so much, that I reordered another set just recently. Thanks so much for making them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bilyeu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Shipt shopping!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these warm/cold insulated bags! I use them for my Shipt shopping and they are so handy, easy to use, portable, and lightweight. I like that these came in a pair, I keep the hot items in one while shopping snd the colds and frozens in the other. And the green one is the Shipt logo color green!
customer_reviews.author: Latte Fan

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage.. bottom ripped with the first use. That and coupled with the high cost... do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: Great tote for lighter shopping trips.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and how easy they are to carry with either the side or top handles...however after only a few uses, one of the handles is starting to tear. You can pack things so well into these totes you just have to remember that they cannot hold a lot of weight. Overall good product, but need to reinforce the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Massey

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart already!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t find any other way to get the seller’s attention... I am extremely disappointed in my second purchase of this product. It’s been less than a month and the seems on the green one are already falling apart! I would really like the seller to reach out and make this right!
customer_reviews.author: Christine L. Hentz

customer_reviews.title: Work OK
customer_reviews.text: Got these for grocery shopping, I've had them about 3 weeks and one is ripping already (the lid, not the bottom or side that is weight bearing). They also aren't the easies to zip open & closed.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bresee

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 store grocery shopping
customer_reviews.text: Great for 2 store grocery shopping! My cold items from the 1st store stay cool in the car while I finish shopping at the 2nd store.
customer_reviews.author: kevin bouwkamp

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy, looks good and keeps things coold
customer_reviews.text: I love the insulated "box" style of this "bag" It holds quite a bit too. I like the side handles for an alternate carry method. It feels and looks durable and well made, time will tell. The only things it won't accommodate is large flat things, like pizza and cheesecake.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Conlee

customer_reviews.title: Great bags if used properly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these bags for over a year and they’re the only bags I use for my groceries. They have lasted that whole time and are in great shape. For the people complaining about the bottom-lining being thin, I guess they don’t realize that when you unfold the bags, you have to push down the bottom insulated piece. It’s really not that complicated, but it would effect the durability and ability to keep items cold. I find these bags really simple and quick to fold and unfold. The only negative would be that the construction makes them a little boxy and hard to carry. Otherwise totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole J.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied and happy
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied and happy, pretty and strong, I use them stationary but they would also serve me as a way out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to put cold items in when I go to the grocery. They hold a lot and are light weight and durable. They zip closed to keep the cold in. Everyone at the store always asks me where I got them. I spray them with lysol when I get them unpacked, and they are good to go again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen N.

customer_reviews.title: perfect size, sturdy, a year of use and nothing has broken!
customer_reviews.text: well made, over year use with groceries, nothing broken, handles solid not eve a tear with normal use. Only improvement would be an easier zipper use but works well enough, for my purposes... ordered another set for backup or gift since have had lots of compliments on the bags and people in stores asking about it...
customer_reviews.author: Pheobe

customer_reviews.title: These are bigger than they look which is great as I am able to put a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are bigger than they look which is great as I am able to put a lot of items in them. Not sure how the cold aspect holds up as I've only had items in them for about 45 minutes (they were cold when I got home). I may update later when I use them for longer periods. Happy with them for now!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: They do the job!
customer_reviews.text: These sacks are easy to use, hold lots of groceries, and keep things cool on hot days! Glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Kross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, sturdy and well-constructed. Folds nice and flat for storage. We use these when we deliver Meals on Wheels - one for the hot meals, one for the cold milk/jello package. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I use them for groceries and they are stiff enough to go on the trolley dolly base stacked and easy to bring in the groceries. Hated the canvas bag that came with the dolly and sought out a more substantial solution. No more fightig with unloading groceries just to bring them in from the car. These boxeswotk through the buying, loading, and toting all in one. Super nice! I am 67 and tired of lugging in bags that break or topple over. Happy purchaser.
customer_reviews.author: Neena

customer_reviews.title: They Work Great
customer_reviews.text: We use these to transport food for the different holiday celebrations. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Deana McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, but break too quickly
customer_reviews.text: I received these bags two weeks ago and have used them approximately three times. I loved them at first (though the straps could be slightly longer for my preferences) but am dismayed to find that the fabric is already wearing through and peeling back. The idea of these bags is great, but they do not hold up to any use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, sturdy, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Wanted a sturdy insulated bag for groceries. It gets hot where I live and these keep my groceries cool. Very durable. Have cheap insulated bags but they fall apart. These do the trick. Very spacious, and very sturdy, expect many years out of these.
customer_reviews.author: SAMIAM

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. They carry the stuff pretty well and can handle the extra weight. Works well for produce, frozen items amd refrigerated items.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Love These Bags
customer_reviews.text: Color and size are excellent however, these are slightly flimsy and a bit too expensive for what they are.....haven’t used them enough to determine their longevity.
customer_reviews.author: TooBratty

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I'm finding more than one use for these! They are about the size to hold a standard brown grocery bag (upright), but I'm also using them for car travel, storing food and (in the second one) electronics. Really an ideal size for just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: CA @ Tahoe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item! I deliver groceries as a part time ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item! I deliver groceries as a part time job and these bags work great at keeping food hot or cold! I'm very happy about this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Bunke

customer_reviews.title: Love them! I have been using the uninsulated bags ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I have been using the uninsulated bags for a few years now and added these to keep my cold food cold on the long ride home from the store. long carry handles, sturdy zipper, folds flat when not in use. Easy to fill. Nothing bad to say at all!
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: I've had these about a month and so far am very happy with them. They seem very sturdy, but they haven't had a lot of wear yet in just a month. This is the winter in Wisconsin, so keeping things cold isn't a big problem right now. If they hang together through the summer and keep things cool during our Wisconsin summer, I'll come back and give them 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: pmilli

customer_reviews.title: Average quality, but do the job
customer_reviews.text: The outside construction feels sturdy but the inside insultation construction is mediocre. The shiny insultation portion riped on it's first trip to the grocery store. They do handle a large amount of groceries and the handles are strong for carrying heavy groceries. They also fold up and are easy to store in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Kelly

customer_reviews.title: These are great for their compactness and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: These are great for their compactness and ease of use. The only issue I have is the zippers are a bit small and tend to bind a bit using 1-handed. Not sure of the insulation properties yet, as it's just above freezing here now.
customer_reviews.author: D Law

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors, but too small for our liking.
customer_reviews.text: They were fine, but not exactly what we were looking for the purpose of using in the car. Too small.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen C M

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: They dont hold coldness too well and zipper is hard to zip. I have a feeling zipper won't last..
customer_reviews.author: CocoaCt

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: They are just what I needed to make shopping in my warehouse store easier and faster. All things that need to be kept cold on my long trip home are safely stored, in stead of flying around in the backseat and floor when an ordinary shopping bag tips over. Makes unloading at home easy also. Good quality and workmanship , will serve for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: Great bags but I thought they would be a little bigger. They would not fit a frozen pizza
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Ripped Out
customer_reviews.text: Do not carry anything other than the lightest items in these bags. The bottom ripped out of the green one on first use.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Does a pretty good job of keeping groceries hot or cold.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love the bright colors, and they work great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags so much! Every time I use them, I get numerous people commenting on them too. They hold a lot, and I like that they easily zipper shut to keep everything extra sealed up to stay cold. And I love the bright colors!! So handy!
customer_reviews.author: JD1234

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags. I keep them in my trunk for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bags. I keep them in my trunk for when we go grocery shopping to put the foods that need to be kept cold. I also use one when I go to the farmers market. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love These Bags. Well worth the purchase. Holds a lot and are very durable and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Yes I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I used them to hold stuffing at thanksgiving, a towel in the bottom then the casserole wrapped in a towel. Kept it hot for 3 1 /2 hours. Can't wait to see what summer brings.
customer_reviews.author: Peppercat1

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Like that it's sturdy and items won't be falling out. I use a walker appliance and it fits right on the seat portion!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: I deliver groceries as a side job and these bags keep me and my customers happy! They hold a decent amount of weight and make carrying large amounts of groceries in one go! They do a good job keeping hot foods hot or cold foods cold. I get so many compliments on these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin P

product_meta.title: Earthwise Insulated Reusable Grocery Bag Shopping Box with Reinforced Bottom Panel and Zipper Top Lid with Extra Side Handles for Easy Lifting (Set of 2) (Green/Purple)
feature_bullets: INNOVATIVE DESIGN: Lid top zippered closure with fully insulated lining to keep cold items cold and hot items hot.

STAYS FLAT IN YOUR CAR OR TRUNK: Each bag has a removable, fold down bottom piece insert for extra durability, with the handles sewn all the way to the bottom of the bag for added strength which keeps these bags flat and sturdy in your trunk so your groceries wont move around on the ride home.
LARGE CAPACITY: Size 10” H x 14.5” W x 10” D. These bags hold a lot and are great for grocery shopping, picnics, the beach, concerts, parties and more.
EXTRA SIDE HANDLES FOR EASY LIFTING: Our bags have side handles for easy lifting of heavy loads. Holds up to 30 lbs. These bags are also make great FOOD DELIVERY BAGS for hot or cold food delivery.
FOLDS COMPLETELY FLAT for easy storage in a kitchen drawer, under a car seat or in your trunk.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,038 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
